meanings.definition: A website that allows collaborative editing of its content.
meanings.sent1: Many students use wikis to work together on projects for school.
meanings.sent2: I found helpful information on the wikis about gardening tips.
meanings.sent3: The wikis decided to throw a virtual party to celebrate their success.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a collection of wikis, each page filled with different memories.
meanings.sent5: The wikis were like a digital library, constantly evolving with new knowledge.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'wiki'.
meanings.sent1: I have bookmarked several wikis for quick reference.
meanings.sent2: The wikis in the library cover a wide range of topics.
meanings.sent3: The group chat was flooded with messages from the wikis.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were like wikis, branching out in different directions.
meanings.sent5: The wikis on the shelf were neatly organized by subject.
